thread.title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces Announces Watches & Clocks for Lawyers and Judges
thread.title_full: WatchBuddy® Timepieces Announces Watches & Clocks for Lawyers and Judges

author: prbuzz.com
title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces Announces Watches & Clocks for Lawyers and Judges
text:
Los Angeles, CA (PRBuzz) October 20, 2015 -- WatchBuddy® Timepieces ( www.lovableproducts.com ) - one of the nation’s finest and most popular brands of Theme Watches and Wall Clocks - proudly announces the release of a collection of Watches and Wall Clocks targeting Lawyers and Judges! They are great for Christmas and Hanukah gifts!
Each of these finely crafted precision timepieces is graced with an iconic dial image of the Legal Profession such as Lady Justice – blindfolded holding up the Balance of Justice in her left hand and the Sword of Defense and Decisiveness in her Right Hand or Simply the Balance of Justice.
Thus WatchBuddy® Timepieces magically transform watches & clocks from mere timepieces into delightful and joyful Objects of Delight for Lawyers and Judges!
The watch is the WatchBuddy Elite which has Chrome Case and Chrome Plated Metal Mesh Band or Deluxe Two-Tone case with leather band. The watch has a 3 hand precision quartz movement.
The wall clock is round and has a 10 inch diameter, a high gloss plastic frame, and a precision quartz movement.
For further information about these WatchBuddy® – Watches and Clocks for Lawyers and Judges please visit:
For Watches - click here
For Clocks - click here
WatchBuddy Watch and Clocks are also featured on many major online shopping venues such as Amazon.com. Most noteworthy is that WatchBuddy’s Store - All Lovable Products by WatchBuddy – is one of the highest rated seller’s on Amazon.com based on Customer Satisfaction Ratings and Customer Service Metrics.
_ _ _ _
About WatchBuddy® Brand Products:
WatchBuddy® is a registered trademark brand of watches, jewelry and fashion accessories held by GreatMerchants.com, Inc., a large group of web based and brick & mortar businesses bringing unique, innovative and creative products and services to consumers.
